Class Strategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lpoo.bombic.Logic.EnemiesStrategy.Strategy
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AdvancedTrapStrategy, ClouderStrategy, GhostStrategy, GreyBallStrategy, MoonerStrategy, PacifierStrategy, RedBallStrategy, SandmasterStrategy, SlimerStrategy, TrapStrategy, TVStrategy

    public abstract class Strategy
extends java.lang.Object
    Creates enemies movement strategy
